cargo-philjs CLI

cargo-philjs is a Cargo extension for developing, building, and deploying PhilJS applications written in Rust.

Installation

Terminal
$# Install from crates.io
$cargo install cargo-philjs
$
$# Or install from source
$cargo install --git https://github.com/philjs/philjs cargo-philjs

Commands

cargo philjs new

Create a new PhilJS project.

Terminal
$# Create with default template
$cargo philjs new my-app
$
$# Choose a specific template
$cargo philjs new my-app --template minimal
$cargo philjs new my-app --template fullstack
$cargo philjs new my-app --template ssr
$cargo philjs new my-app --template liveview
$cargo philjs new my-app --template islands

Options

OptionDescriptionDefault
--template, -tProject template to usefullstack
--name, -nPackage name (if different from directory)Directory name
--no-gitSkip git initializationfalse
--typescriptInclude TypeScript frontend setupfalse

cargo philjs dev

Start the development server with hot reload.

Terminal
$# Start dev server
$cargo philjs dev
$
$# With custom port
$cargo philjs dev --port 3000
$
$# Open browser automatically
$cargo philjs dev --open

Options

OptionDescriptionDefault
--port, -pDevelopment server port8080
--hostHost to bind to127.0.0.1
--open, -oOpen browser on startfalse
--hot-reloadEnable hot reloadtrue
--releaseBuild in release modefalse
i

Hot Reload

cargo philjs dev watches your Rust files and automatically rebuilds WASM when changes are detected. Page state is preserved when possible.

cargo philjs build

Build the project for production.

Terminal
$# Production build
$cargo philjs build --release
$
$# Build with optimizations
$cargo philjs build --release --wasm-opt
$
$# Build for specific target
$cargo philjs build --release --features csr
$cargo philjs build --release --features ssr

Options

OptionDescriptionDefault
--release, -rBuild with optimizationsfalse
--wasm-optRun wasm-opt for smaller bundlesfalse
--featuresCargo features to enableProject default
--out-dirOutput directorydist
--ssgPre-render static pagesfalse

cargo philjs serve

Serve the production build locally for testing.

Terminal
$# Serve built files
$cargo philjs serve
$
$# Custom port
$cargo philjs serve --port 4000

cargo philjs test

Run tests including WASM tests in a browser environment.

Terminal
$# Run all tests
$cargo philjs test
$
$# Run specific tests
$cargo philjs test -- component_tests
$
$# Run in headless browser
$cargo philjs test --headless

Options

OptionDescriptionDefault
--headlessRun in headless browserfalse
--browserBrowser to use (chrome, firefox, safari)chrome
--coverageGenerate coverage reportfalse

cargo philjs generate

Generate components, pages, and other code.

Terminal
$# Generate a component
$cargo philjs generate component Header
$cargo philjs generate component --path components/nav Button
$
$# Generate a page
$cargo philjs generate page About
$cargo philjs generate page users/[id]
$
$# Generate a server function
$cargo philjs generate server-fn GetTodos

cargo philjs fmt

Format view! macro code for consistent styling.

Terminal
$# Format all files
$cargo philjs fmt
$
$# Check without modifying
$cargo philjs fmt --check
$
$# Format specific file
$cargo philjs fmt src/app.rs

Configuration

Configure cargo-philjs via Cargo.toml or philjs.toml:

philjs.tomltoml
1# philjs.toml
2[package]
3name = "my-app"
4 
5[dev]
6port = 8080
7hot-reload = true
8open-browser = false
9 
10[build]
11out-dir = "dist"
12wasm-opt = true
13minify = true
14 
15[features]
16default = ["ssr"]
17ssr = []
18csr = []
19hydrate = []
20 
21[assets]
22# Copy these directories to output
23static = ["static", "assets"]
24# Include these in the HTML
25scripts = ["pkg/my-app.js"]
26styles = ["styles/main.css"]
27 
28[env]
29# Environment variables for different modes
30[env.development]
31API_URL = "http://localhost:3001"
32 
33[env.production]
34API_URL = "https://api.example.com"

CI/CD Integration

.github/workflows/deploy.ymlyaml
1name: Build and Deploy
2 
3on:
4  push:
5    branches: [main]
6 
7jobs:
8  build:
9    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
10    steps:
11      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
12 
13      - name: Install Rust
14        uses: dtolnay/rust-action@stable
15        with:
16          targets: wasm32-unknown-unknown
17 
18      - name: Install cargo-philjs
19        run: cargo install cargo-philjs
20 
21      - name: Build
22        run: cargo philjs build --release --wasm-opt
23 
24      - name: Test
25        run: cargo philjs test --headless
26 
27      - name: Deploy
28        uses: cloudflare/pages-action@v1
29        with:
30          apiToken: ${{ secrets.CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN }}
31          accountId: ${{ secrets.CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID }}
32          projectName: my-app
33          directory: dist

Troubleshooting

Common Issues

WASM target not installed

Terminal
$rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown

wasm-bindgen version mismatch

Terminal
$cargo update -p wasm-bindgen

Out of memory during build

Terminal
$cargo philjs build --release -- -j 1
